qas.question: when did the English High court find Microsoft's use of the term "SkyDrive" infringed on Sky's right?
What year did BSkyB and Microsoft announce their settlement?
What did Microsoft announce that it would rename Sky Drive to?
What did Microsoft announce that it would rename Sky Drive Pro to?
What kind of service is the SkyDrive Service?
When did the English High Court of Justice find that Microsoft’s use of the term "SkyDrive" did not infringe on Sky’s right to the "Sky" trademark?
When did Microsoft decide to appeal the ruling?
What did Microsoft announce that it would rename OneDrive to?
What did Microsoft announce that it would rename OneDrive for Business to?
When did Microsoft announce OneDrive will soon become SkyDrive?

context: <a0_1>In <a0_0><a0_2><b5_0>July 2013<b5_0/><a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/>, the English High Court of Justice found that Microsoft’s use of the term "SkyDrive" infringed on Sky’s right to the "Sky" trademark. On <a1_2><b6_0>31 July <a1_0><a1_1>2013<b6_0/><a1_2/><a1_1/><a1_0/>, BSkyB and Microsoft announced their settlement, in which Microsoft will not appeal the ruling, and will rename its <b7_0>SkyDrive<b7_0/> <a4_0><a4_1><a4_2>cloud storage<a4_1/><a4_0/> service<a4_2/> after an unspecified "reasonable period of time to allow for an orderly transition to a new brand," plus "financial and other terms, the details of which are confidential". On <b9_0>27 January 2014<b9_0/>, Microsoft announced "that SkyDrive will soon become <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2>OneDrive<a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/>" and "<b8_0>SkyDrive Pro<b8_0/>" becomes "<a3_0><a3_1><a3_2>OneDrive for Business<a3_2/><a3_1/><a3_0/>".
